ability.name: Studious
ability.description: Whenever Amanda draws one or more cards from the Skill deck, she draws one extra card and then discards one of the cards.

ability.name: Scrounge
ability.description: When Pete draws from the Common item, Unique item, or Spell deck, he may draw from either the top or the bottom of that deck, his choice. Pete may look at the bottom card of those decks at any time.

ability.name: Shrewd Dealer
ability.description: Whenever Bob draws one or more cards from the Common item deck, he draws one extra card and then discards one of the cards.

ability.name: Psychology
ability.description: Dr. Fern may restore 1 Sanity to herself or another character in her location. She cannot raise a character's Sanity higher than that character's maximum Sanity.

ability.name: Hometown Advantage
ability.description: When drawing location encounters in Arkham, Darrell draws two cards and may choose whichever one of the two he wants. This ability does not work when drawing gate encounters in Other Worlds.

ability.name: Magical Gift
ability.description: Whenever The Great Drake draws one or more cards from the Spell deck, he draws one extra card and then discards one of the cards.

ability.name: Psychic Sensitivity
ability.description: When drawing gate encounters in Other Worlds, Gloria draws two cards that match the color of one of the Other World's encounter symbols, then chooses whichever one of the two she wants. This ability does not work when drawing location encounters in Arkham.

ability.name: Strong Mind
ability.description: Harvey reduces all Sanity losses he suffers by 1, to a minimum of 0.

ability.name: Hunches
ability.description: Joe rolls one extra bonus die when he spends a Clue token to add to a roll.

ability.name: Science!
ability.description: Gates and monsters cannot appear in Kate's location due to her flux stabilizer. Monsters and gates do not disappear if she enters their location, however, and monsters can move into her location as usual. Do not place a Clue token on the Science Building to start the game.

ability.name: Research
ability.description: Once per turn, Mandy can activate this ability after any investigator (including herself) makes a skill check. That investigator then re-rolls all of the dice rolled for that check that did not result in successes.

ability.name: Strong Body
ability.description: Michael reduces all Stamina losses he suffers by 1, to a minimum of 0.

ability.name: Archaeology
ability.description: Whenever Monterey draws one or more cards from the Unique item deck, he draws one extra card and then discards one of the cards.

ability.name: Guardian Angel
ability.description: Sister Mary is never Lost in Time and Space. Instead, if her Sanity is 0, she returns to Arkham Asylum. If her Stamina is 0, she returns to St. Mary's Hospital. If neither her Sanity or her Stamina are 0, she returns to South Church.

ability.name: Physician
ability.description: Dr. Lee may restore 1 Stamina to himself or another character in his location. He cannot raise a character's Stamina higher than that character's maximum Stamina.

description.text: .18 Derringer cannot be lost or stolen unless you choose to allow it.
.18 Derringer cannot be lost or stolen unless you choose to allow it.

Exhaust and spend 2 movement points and 1 Sanity to roll a die. If the die is a success, draw 1 Spell or gain 3 Clue tokens. If it is a failure, lose 2 Stamina.
Spend 3 movement points and discard Ancient Tablet to roll 2 dice. For every success rolled, draw 1 Spell. For every failure rolled, gain 2 Clue tokens.
Lose 2 Stamina and discard Blue Watcher of the Pyramid to automatically succeed at a Combat check or a Fight check or Lore check made to close a gate. This cannot be used against an Ancient One.

Exhaust and spend 2 movement points to make a Lore (-1) check. If you pass, draw 1 Spell, lose 1 Sanity, and put 1 Stamina token from the bank on Book of Dzyan. If there are 2 Stamina tokens on it, discard Book of Dzyan. If you fail, nothing happens.

Put 1 Stamina token from the bank on Enchanted Jewelry to avoid losing 1 Stamina. If there are 3 Stamina tokens on it, discard Enchanted Jewelry.
Lose 3 Sanity and 3 Stamina and discard Flute of the Outer Gods before making a Combat check to defeat all monsters in your current area. This does not affect Ancient Ones.
When you return to Arkham from an Other World, you can return to any location with an open gate, not just those leading to the Other World you were in.
